objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='grad1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#F5F2E9;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E8E4D8;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='grad2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#2C4C3B;stop-opacity:0.7'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#2C4C3B;stop-opacity:0.1'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#grad1)'/><rect x='40' y='40' width='1000' height='1000' rx='15' stroke='#2C4C3B' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.6'/><rect x='60' y='60' width='960' height='960' rx='10' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.6'/><path d='M0,300 C150,280 300,330 450,300 C600,270 750,330 900,300 C1050,270 1200,300 1350,270 L1350,-100 L-100,-100 Z' fill='url(#grad2)' opacity='0.5'/><path d='M0,780 C150,760 300,810 450,780 C600,750 750,810 900,780 C1050,750 1200,780 1350,750 L1350,1200 L-100,1200 Z' fill='url(#grad2)' opacity='0.5'/><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='100' fill='#FFC107' opacity='0.1'/><circle cx='880' cy='880' r='120' fill='#FFC107' opacity='0.1'/><rect x='80' y='80' width='920' height='920' rx='8' stroke='#FFC107' stroke-width='1' stroke-dasharray='5,5' fill='none'/></svg>

objects.text:
German Marklon Polycarbonate Shell
40L Capacity Lightweight Design
Silent Run Japanese Wheel Technology
USB Charging Port & TSA Lock

product_details.description: Accessibility just made a move to the next level. No cap. Our classic Cabin Luggage has now evolved! The Cabin Pro is designed for quick access to help you breeze through security. UNDESTRUCTABLE GERMAN MARKLON POLYCARBONATE SHELL: Casing: Hard LIGHTWEIGHT & INDUSTRY BEST STORAGE: Capacity: 40liter, Weight: 3.65 grams, Dimension : 57.8 x 37 x 24.3 cm SILENT RUN JAPANESE WHEEL TECHNOLOGY: Number of wheels: 8, Super Smooth Hinomoto Wheels THE MOST FEATURE RICH LUGGAGE: USB Port: 1, Powerbank not included, Lock Type: TSA Number Lock, Comes with magic eraser, Dust Bag & Laundry Bag Water resistant: Yes Outer material - Polycarbonate ** Water resistance level - Water Resistant ** Country of Origin - India **

banner_details:
The banner features a modern and premium travel product advertisement. At the top, the **heading** showcases a bold, futuristic font indicating the product category. Just beneath, the **subheading** emphasizes the brand and type of product using vibrant golden-yellow to grab attention. On the left, the **description** text block lists product features in a clean sans-serif font. Bold pricing is presented in a large **price** text element just above a prominent call-to-action button (**cta_button** and **cta** text). The right side of the layout prominently displays the product image (**product_image**), creatively aligned to overlap the content area. A subtle background design with soft gradient waves, outlined boxes, and circular graphics adds sophistication without clutter.

**Color Palette**:
- Forest Green: `#2C4C3B`
- Golden Yellow: `#FFC107`
- Light Ivory Gradient: `#F5F2E9` to `#E8E4D8`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Charcoal Gray: `#333333`
product_color: The product image features a stylish suitcase with a sleek khaki green exterior (#4A5A41), paired with vibrant mustard yellow accents (#F4B400). The yellow interiors and zipper linings create a bold contrast, making the design pop while emphasizing functional segments. Shades of black (#1C1C1C) on the handle and wheels add depth and structure. The matte green tone offers a grounded, modern aesthetic, blending seamlessly with the bright yellow highlights to ensure visual balance. For an advertisement banner, the core palette should include khaki green (#4A5A41), mustard yellow (#F4B400), charcoal black (#1C1C1C), and soft cream (#F5F5DC) for contrast and legibility.
